snippet: At least one French commando was killed during a raid Friday night in Somalia to rescue an intelligence agent being held hostage, the French defense ministry said.
abstract: French special forces fail in hostage rescue mission in southern Somalia; Pres Francois Hollande says two French soldiers died on mission and one French hostage was killed by his Islamist captors.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and SCOTT SAYARE

lead_paragraph: At least one French commando was killed during a raid Friday night in Somalia to rescue an intelligence agent being held hostage, the French defense ministry said.

headline.seo: French Soldier Killed in Somalia Commando Raid
headline.main: French Soldier Killed in Somalia Commando Raid
headline.print_headline: French Hostage and 2 Soldiers Die in Somalia Rescue Effort
